entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Labrador City
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:58 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -20.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wabush Airport 5:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

Temperature: -20.6°C

Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 68 %

Dewpoint: -24.9°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the evening. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
